statements: UPDATE EmailCampaigns SET campaign_name='Summer Sale Campaign', start_date='2022-07-01', end_date='2022-08-15' WHERE campaign_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE EmailCampaigns SET target_audience='Newsletter Subscribers', open_rate=0.2, click_rate=0.05 WHERE campaign_id='abcdef12-3456-7890-1234-ccccdddeefff';
UPDATE EmailCampaigns SET open_rate = 0.25, click_rate = 0.15 WHERE campaign_id = 'af3b2c44-98ba-4ff4-9c9a-3b042bf9c7ec';
UPDATE EmailCampaigns SET campaign_type = 'Seasonal', target_audience = 'Subscribers' WHERE campaign_id = 'b4d36382-d80e-4c51-9b20-24ae45d6af80';
UPDATE candidates SET candidate_name = 'John Doe' WHERE candidate_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET target_audience = 'New Users', end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 3;
UPDATE candidates SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE candidate_id = 1;
UPDATE campaigns SET target_audience='Tech Enthusiasts', start_date='2022-01-01', end_date='2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
UPDATE passive_candidates SET company = 'ABC Inc', job_title = 'Software Engineer' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE campaign_responses SET response_status = 'Accepted' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE passive_candidates SET company='New Company Inc.', job_title='Senior Developer' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET status='Active', start_date='2022-08-01' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE candidate_details SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email_address='john.doe@example.com' WHERE candidate_id=1;
UPDATE campaign_history SET interaction_type='Email', interaction_details='Sent follow-up email' WHERE history_id=3;
UPDATE candidate_details SET email_address='john.smith@example.com', last_name='Smith', phone_number='123-456-7890' WHERE candidate_id=1;
UPDATE job_opportunities SET salary_range=75000.00, location='New York', job_description='Exciting opportunity in a fast-paced environment' WHERE opportunity_id=5;

UPDATE email_campaigns
SET is_active = FALSE,
    end_date = '2022-12-31'
WHERE campaign_id = 456;
UPDATE passive_candidates SET email_address = 'newemail@example.com', job_preferences = '{"location": "Remote", "salary": 80000}' WHERE candidate_id = 12345;
UPDATE email_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-10-01', is_active = false WHERE campaign_id = 54321;
